VM_TOPOLOGY.__topology_type_comment__: specify type of deployment: PVP, PVVP, etc.
VM_TOPOLOGY.__ova_file_path_comment__: Absolute path to the ova file that needs to be deployed.
VM_TOPOLOGY.__vm_details_comment__: Specify deployment details for each of the VM's to be deployed

VM_DETAILS.__networks_comment__: for the given 3-nic vm, specify first 2 networks(portgroups) for dpdk and the third network for VM management.
